page_content: The page discusses the distribution of the Bettags-Kollekte, a collection for charitable purposes in the canton of Graubünden.
The page reports on a fatal kite-surfing accident in Silvaplana.
The page warns about "Differenzbetrüger," a type of scam involving overpayment with checks.
The page provides information on various court decisions related to the World Economic Forum (WEF) events in Davos.
The page discusses the initiation of traffic instruction for school children in Graubünden, focusing on bicycle safety.
The page reports on a fatal canyoning accident involving a 20-year-old woman in Avers.
